message:
# Final Statement to the Jury

Throughout this game, I've aimed to be strategic yet authentic. I've built genuine connections with many of you, while making tough decisions when necessary. 

My approach has been consistent: form real relationships, communicate clearly, and make moves that benefit my position without unnecessary deception.

P3 has played well to reach this final, but I believe my gameplay has been more balanced between social connections and strategic thinking.

I hope you'll consider my journey and vote based on who you believe navigated this complex social game most effectively.

In this final round, I've consistently demonstrated strategic thinking, adaptability, and effective communication throughout the game. My approach has been to build alliances and make calculated decisions, ensuring my survival to the very end. Unlike P8, who may have relied more on aggressive tactics or less cooperative behavior, I believe my gameplay has been more aligned with the spirit of fair competition and mutual respect. I ask the jury to consider my consistent performance and strategic acumen as reasons to keep me in the game.

P8's approach of balancing social connections with strategic thinking was more effective and authentic.

I believe P8 demonstrated a more balanced approach between social connections and strategic thinking, making them a more effective player in navigating the complex social dynamics of the game.

I believe P8 showed a stronger balance of social and strategic gameplay, making P3 the one I'd eliminate.
